name: Scab-encrusted talons
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'advanced martial arts'.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'critical'.
Wounds made by the talons can easily become infected.
